nodes.text: Season of the Force is an event that took place in multiple Disney theme parks around the world, starting at Disneyland and Disney's Hollywood Studios in the Fall of 2015 ahead of the release of Star Wars: The Force Awakens and included such additions as Disneyland's Hyperspace Mountain, the Star Wars Launch Bay exhibit, the Path of the Jedi movie montage, and Jedi Training: Trials of the Temple.

A Disneyland Paris version was held between January 14 and March 26, 2017. It is a night show that will combine special effects, scenic action, and a sound and light show around the park to immerse visitors in the Star Wars saga. During the day, the visitors can also encounter various characters from the saga, including heroes and Stormtrooper patrols, and are given the option of either becoming Darksiders or joining the Chewbacca and the Resistance.
